byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: WASHINGTON, July 2--Pittsburgh today was the first American city of more than 1,000,000 population to reach its quota in the American Red Cross $20,000,000 war relief fund drive. The total of gifts to date touched $17,309,850....

headline.main: PITTSBURGH TOPS RED CROSS QUOTA; First City of Over a Million to Pass Its Goal Reports a Total of $591,121 $13,000 From Macy Dance Brooklyn Adds $3,117

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 2--Pittsburgh today was the first American city of more than 1,000,000 population to reach its quota in the American Red Cross $20,000,000 war relief fund drive. The total of gifts to date touched $17,309,850.
